lead_paragraph: SHEA--Francis P. Beloved husband of Lois. Longtime NY Times Stereotyper. Incredible father of Lois, Maureen, Mike, Tim, Brian and Willie. Rest in peace, Dad. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHEA, FRANCIS P
